lines: 1. Yes' as' omosalaba,Nensoko engiyaEkogweni' oborwaire,Korw' ria Kalvari.
Kalvari, Kalvari,'Gotogia botambe,'Nkoro yan' etimoke,As'oroche ng'umbu.
2. Agw' as' omosalaba,Nkanyor' amabera;'Ng'enang'eni ya mambia,'Ndaberi' amasaria.
3. Ang' as' omosalaba,Ng'ondi ya NyasaeNkonye ntare botambe,'S' ekiriria kiao.
4. Ang' as' omosalaba,Nganye, nsemeretie,Goika ng'ike ens'eria,As' oroche ng'umbu.
